DOC.brief_summary: This 8 week at home study is designed to explore efficacy endpoints and evaluate the safety of intranasal Bremelanotide in women with Female Sexual Arousal Disorder. Efficacy will be assessed vs. a parallel placebo group.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Bremelanotide in Women With Female Sexual Arousal Disorder (FSAD)
DOC.criteria: Post menopausal and in general good health In a stable relationship with a male partner for at least 6 months Willing to attempt sexual activity once a week with your partner
